name: Anitopia: a video game of incredible species and ecosystem simulation
blurb: Anitopia is a game which puts you in control. You design and create a world in which your creatures flourish. Watch them change, live, and grow.

rewards.reward: As a thank you for your donation, you will be listed in the credits as a contributor.
At this fine and respectable level, you will not only be listed in the credits as a contributor, but you will also receive the finshed game when it is released!

Ahh...quite the contributor, aren't you? You will receive all of the above, plus exclusive access to the continually updated project website, even after the funding period is over! The reward doesn't stop there, as you will be able to contribute helpful suggestions and concerns. This will also be specially noted in the credits! Access to the project is only good until beta testing begins.

Alright, here's an interesting one. You will receive all of the above, plus you will get a full color, high-quality printed version of the detailed game booklet! This includes rules, game features, and detailed game mechanics. This would normally be available only as a digital download for those who purchase the game. But, the lucky few at this donation level will receive the limited edition printed version of the booklet!

Way to go! You are a fan of the finer things in life, so I have a very fine offer. First, you will receive all of the above. Second, you will receive an invitation to be a beta tester! That's right, you will not only have exclusive access to the project, but you will also be a major player in this game's creation. You will have a great deal of input as a well-respected beta tester, and this will also be noted in the credits!

You are indeed a special person, so at this level you will hold a very special position. You will receive all of the above, and on top of that, you will be listed as an executive producer in the credits!

Okay, this reward is partly for fun. On the other hand, it is the chance to have a one-of-a-kind experience! By giving the incredible, generous, amazing donation of $500, you will receive all of the above. But, here's the best part: you will be the one to name the creatures! Right now, the creatures which make up the initial species are called "Newlings," but you will be the one to change that. This will be mentioned in the credits. Looking at the big picture, you will have contributed suggestions, tested the game, named the creatures, be listed as a producer, and then received a copy when it's all over. What fun!
